name: Dyslexia Institute UK CIC
goal: To promote and support dyslexia throughout Europe. This will be achieved by the acceptance of the European Dyslexia Charter as a guide of standards across the EU.
euInitiatives: European Dyslexia Charter which has been actively promoted to the EU Parliament in Brussels. The aim of the charter is to improve the lives of the millions of dyslexics who live in the community of Europe.
